unpublishedAction.name: post_invoice_data_total_trips

actionConfiguration.body:
WITH data(
    serial_for_challan, fleet_id, fleet_tracking_id, required_date, payment_method, shop_id, shop_name, challan_number, tracking_id, vehicle_number, load_point, unload_point, truck_price, additional_fee, total_revenue, vat, ait, truck_price_with_ait, spread, sourcing_cost, collectable, total_price_after_vat_ait, additional_fee_remarks, status, truck_price_ait_evat, additional_fee_ait_evat)
 AS (
    VALUES
          {{get_parcel_details_v1.data.map((a,i)=>"(" + 
						(i+1)+","+
						a.id+",'"+
						a.tracking_id+"','"+
						a.fleet_requested_at+"','"+
						a.payment_method+"',"+
						a.shop_ID+",'"+
						a.shop_name.replace("'","") +"','"+
						a.challanNumber+"','"+
						a.tracking_id+"','"+						
						a.vehicle_number+"','"+
						a.load_point.replace("'","") +"','"+
						a.unload_point.replace("'","")+"',"+									
					 	a.base_fare+","+
						a.demurrage_fee+","+
						a.total_truck_price+","+
					  a.calculated_VAT+","+
						a.calculated_AIT+","+
						a.truck_price_ait+","+
						a.spread+","+
            a.transport_team_rate+","+
						a.collectible+","+
						a.total_price_after_vat_ait+",'"+
						a.demurrage_remarks+"','"+
						'Ready-to-send' +"',"+
						a.truck_price_ait+","+
						a.additional_fee_AIT+
						")").join()}}
),
ins_finance_trip_invoices AS (
    INSERT INTO
        finance_trip_invoices (
            invoice_number, trip_counts, trip_total_revenue, client_name, trip_month, vat, ait, spread, sourcing_cost, banner, columns_to_print, status, collectable, total_price_after_vat_ait, shop_id,vat_rate,sd_rate,user_data
        )
        select {{"'"+InvoiceNumberCopy.text+"'"}}, {{parseInt(Table1.selectedRow.TOTAL_TRIP_COUNT)}}, {{parseInt(Table1.selectedRow.BILLING_AMOUNT)}}, {{"'"+Table1.selectedRow.SHOP_NAME.replace("'","") +"'"}}, {{"'"+Table1.selectedRow.customColumn41+"'"}},{{Table1.selectedRow.calculated_VAT}},{{Table1.selectedRow.calculated_AIT}},{{Table1.selectedRow.SPREAD}},{{Table1.selectedRow.LIFTING_PRICE}}, {{"'"+Table1.selectedRow.Banner+"'"}},
	{{"'"+ Table1.selectedRow.Comma_Seperated_Column +"'"}}, 'Ready-to-send', {{Table1.selectedRow.collectible}}, {{Table1.selectedRow.total_price_after_vat_ait}}, {{Table1.selectedRow.SHOP_ID}}, {{Table1.selectedRow.VAT_Value.replace('%','')}}, {{Table1.selectedRow.AIT_Value}},{{"'"+appsmith.store.user_data+"'"}}
	RETURNING invoice_number
)
INSERT INTO
        trip_level_invoice (
            fleet_id, fleet_tracking_id, required_date, payment_method, shop_id, shop_name, challan_number, tracking_id, vehicle_number, load_point, unload_point, truck_price, additional_fee, total_revenue, invoice_number, vat, ait, spread, sourcing_cost, collectable, total_price_after_vat_ait, serial_for_challan, additional_fee_remarks, status,truck_price_with_ait, truck_price_ait_evat, additional_fee_ait_evat
        )
    SELECT
        fleet_id, fleet_tracking_id, cast(required_date as timestamp), payment_method, shop_id, shop_name, challan_number, tracking_id, vehicle_number, load_point, unload_point, truck_price, additional_fee, total_revenue, (select invoice_number from ins_finance_trip_invoices), vat, ait, spread, sourcing_cost, collectable, total_price_after_vat_ait, serial_for_challan, additional_fee_remarks, status, truck_price_with_ait, truck_price_ait_evat, additional_fee_ait_evat
    FROM
        data

jsonPathKeys:
get_parcel_details_v1.data.map((a,i)=>"(" + 
						(i+1)+","+
						a.id+",'"+
						a.tracking_id+"','"+
						a.fleet_requested_at+"','"+
						a.payment_method+"',"+
						a.shop_ID+",'"+
						a.shop_name.replace("'","") +"','"+
						a.challanNumber+"','"+
						a.tracking_id+"','"+						
						a.vehicle_number+"','"+
						a.load_point.replace("'","") +"','"+
						a.unload_point.replace("'","")+"',"+									
					 	a.base_fare+","+
						a.demurrage_fee+","+
						a.total_truck_price+","+
					  a.calculated_VAT+","+
						a.calculated_AIT+","+
						a.truck_price_ait+","+
						a.spread+","+
            a.transport_team_rate+","+
						a.collectible+","+
						a.total_price_after_vat_ait+",'"+
						a.demurrage_remarks+"','"+
						'Ready-to-send' +"',"+
						a.truck_price_ait+","+
						a.additional_fee_AIT+
						")").join()
